short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Changes all twitter links to fx links as you copy them, configurable to your embed fixer of choice.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The twitter and x links you copy will be automatically converted to fxtwitter or whatever you decide to point them to. As of 2.0, you can also add embed fixers for any sites you want.
